remarks: The absolute value of a finite product .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodabs2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodabs2.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fprodabs2 $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` prod_ k e. A B ) = prod_ k e. A ( abs ` B ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
